title: HEATHER FLOWER TEA
directions: Fill a t-sac or fine mesh tea diffuser with 2 tablespoons dried, food grade heather flowers.
In a small-medium saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil.
Add the heather-filled tea sac or diffuser to the water and secure to the side (I usually use a clothes pin to secure the t-sac). Turn heat off.
Allow to steep for 10 minutes (15 minutes at the most).
Pour into heat-safe mugs, serve with optional honey or preferred sweetener and optional lemon slices.
It is recommended to have 1-2 cups of heather flower tea and no more than at a time because too much can cause liver damage.
heather flower tea can alter the effects of some medications, if you have any concern, please consult your doctor.
pregnant and breastfeeding women should avoid drinking heather flower tea
ingredients: 2 tablespoons food grade, edible heather flowers
